text: Serve Robotics: A Hold Until We See Lower Risk And Improved Financials. Serve Robotics is rated a hold due to promising technology but significant financial and execution risks. SERV's growth is driven by a major UberEats partnership and a large addressable market, but revenue is highly concentrated among two customers. Financial concerns include inconsistent revenue, negative gross margins, and growing net losses, raising questions about long-term profitability.

text: HDV: A Defensive Dividend Play. The iShares Core High Dividend ETF offers a quality-biased, low-beta portfolio focused on large-cap, defensive sectors like consumer staples, healthcare, and energy. HDV provides an attractive 3.2% dividend yield and trades at a discount to the broader market but at a premium compared to most dividend ETF peers. The fund's defensive sector tilt and low volatility profile limit downside risk, yet result in underperformance during bull markets and high exposure to oil prices.
